sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-row>
      <b-col v-for="type in typeRamifications" md="6" xl="6" :key="type">
          <label for="nom" class="form-label">{{type.nom}}</label>
          <Select2 v-model="ramification" required :options="typeRamifications.map(item =>({id: item.id, text: item.nom}))"     style="padding: 10"/>


      </b-col>
  </b-row>

</template>
<script>
import Select2 from 'vue3-select2-component';
import Api from "../helpers/api";

export default {
    components:{
        Select2
    },
    data(){
      return{
          api: new Api(),
          fields: [],
          typeRamifications: [],
          ramification: null,
      }
    },

    created() {
        this.api.listing("/type_ramifications", this.fields, "tram.ordre", "asc", 1000, 1 )
            .then(response => {
                this.typeRamifications = response.data;
            })

    }

}
</script>
